name: Performance Management - Reminder and Individual Performance Generation 2/3
description: In the second scenario, reminders are sent for those team members whose reviews have not been completed yet. For those reviews that have been completed, a report with a visual chart are created and sent to the manager on Slack. This template works with this Google Doc template: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wf0N0KfWqnsDgI96MYfpxBZpC--cVh9NVYdaju-N3as/edit?usp=sharing and this QuickChart: https://quickchart.io/chart/render/zm-6ac62add-a5e2-49aa-93ee-f3138962e196
